Question & Options:
What actions did Glass take in relation to Superintendent Washburn and Tramell?
Options:
A. A) Glass shot Superintendent Washburn
B. B) Glass pointed a gun at Tramell
C. C) Glass was institutionalized at a mental hospital
D. D) Superintendent Washburn tackled Glass
Correct Answer: A) Glass shot Superintendent Washburn, B) Glass pointed a gun at Tramell
